item.title: Sofitel Kunming provides convenient access to the city center
item.description:
Sofitel, the luxury hotel brand under AccorHotels, has launched its newest property, Sofitel Kunming. Located in the city center, it’s the only international luxury hotel in Kunming. Situated in Kunming’s central business district, the 400-room hotel spans the 27th to 52nd floors. It showcases a blend of French elegance and art de vivre with touches of Yunnan’s vibrant ethnic cultures and customs. “The debut of Sofitel Kunming signifies a period of rapid growth for AccorHotels in China, as we continue to solidify our dedication to delivering world-renowned, refined French hospitality to discerning Chinese travelers,” shared Paul Richardson, Chief Operating Officer of AccorHotels Greater China...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sofitel-kunming-provides-convenient-access-to-the-city-center/
